fields.description: As stated above the conditions always seem to evaluate to false, even though they work for WebItems etc.
fields.summary: The conditions entity_property_exists / content_property_equal_to won't work using WebPanels

fields.description:
h3. Summary
When a page has the Roadmap Planner macro it makes the top header not fixed, which means when you scroll the page down the top macro goes away.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a page and add some lines of content to make it scrollable
# Add the Roadmap Planner macro at the bottom

h3. Expected Results
Scrolling down the page the top header would be fixed
h3. Actual Results
The top header goes away
 
h3. Notes
The browser's development tools shows the header with a missing class element
{code}<header id="header" role="banner">{code}
Whereas a working page would show and additional "class" element that upon scrolling would add the fixed-header valure:
{code}<header id="header" role="banner" class>{code}
fields.summary: Top header not fixed when page contains the Roadmap macro

fields.description:
h3. Summary

Page title are not populated when user create page template.


h3. Steps to replicate

# Create a test space
# Go to space tools > Templates and click create new template
# Add the template title and some contents on the page then save it.
# Create a page (...) and choose the template you created in step2 


h3. Observed behaviour

The page title is not added
 !test.png|thumbnail! 


h3. Expected behaviour

Page title should be added automatically
fields.summary: Page title is not added automatically when creating from template

fields.description: For the Rhythmone organization, it would be extremely helpful if admins had the ability to reorder the customized global templates displayed via the create window (see screenshot attached).  Since our team has applied a unified taxonomy across all spaces (Initiative, Platforms, & Teams) the ordering of  templates has significant value.  For example, the order of the templates displayed should reflect the page tree structure  (see screenshot attached).
fields.summary: Customize order of templates displayed in Confluence Create window

fields.description:
When I add a comment to a Confluence page I want to be able to mark a comment as internal only. Specifically this is useful for the KB Conluence space. I want to have the page itself visible to my outside customers but I also want to add internal comments to that page that are only visible for me and my colleagues inside my company, not to our external customers. 

 

JIRA already has that feature. Please extend this to Confluence.
fields.summary: Allow changing permissions for comments to Confluence pages

fields.description:
h3. Summary

Missing download menu on PDF file preview, when using PDF macro in the same page that is pointing to the same PDF file.
Not possible to edit the Excel file in Excel file preview, when using Excel macro in the same page that is pointing to the same Excel file.
h3. Steps to reproduce
 # Create a page
 # Insert PDF or Excel Attachment on the page.
 # On the same page, use PDF macro that is pointing to the same PDF file
 # On the same page, use Excel macro that is pointing to the same Excel file

h3. Expected Result

Able to show download menu and should be able to edit the excel file.
h3. Actual Result

The download menu is missing and you will not be able to edit the excel file.
fields.summary: File Preview not working properly if you have macro pointing to the same file in the same page.

fields.description:
h3. Summary
The link of draft page navigates to _"Page Not Found"_ if {{spaceKey}} contains multibyte character.

h3. Environment
* Confluence 1000.1618.0

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create user who has multibyte username such as "あいうえお"
# Create page, input title and leave it draft (Select "Close" but not "Publish")
# Go to drafts page
**  !Screenshot 2017-07-03 10.13.11.png|thumbnail! 
# Click the link of draft page
# Confirm the link navigates to _"Page Not Found"_
**  !Screenshot_2017-07-03_10_13_25.png|thumbnail! 

h3. Expected Results
The link of drafts navigates to editor

h3. Actual Results
The link of drafts navigates to "Page not found"

h3. Notes
Confluence only allows ASCII letters as space key except personal space.
 !Screenshot_2017-07-03_10_37_30.png|thumbnail! 

h3.Workaround
* Temporary workaround
## Replace {{spaceKey=~%20%20%20%20%20}} with {{spaceKey=~あいうえお}} (using username) at navigation bar
* Permanent solution
## Rename username to new username which only contains ASCII characters
## Create temporary space
## Move all pages from personal space to temporary space (apply temporary workaround above to move unpublished pages)
## Go to _Space tools_ > _Overview_ > _Delete space_ > Select _OK_
## Create personal space and make sure URL contains new username
## Move back the pages from temporary space to new personal space
fields.summary: Unable to access draft page if personal space is created with multibyte username

fields.description:
h4. Summary of Issue

When the search string on the _JIRA Service Desk Customer portal_ contains a question mark, Confluence returns no results.
h4. How to reproduce

Open a JIRA Service Desk Customer portal that is linked to a Confluence Service Desk space. eg. {{<base_url>/servicedesk/customer/portals}}.

Search string: *branch?* - will return no results
Search string: *branch ?* - will return no results
Search string: *branch* - will return results

Assuming there is a Confluence page which contains the word *branch*.
Searching for any of the above search strings in Confluence do return results.

h4. Expected Result

Expected Confluence to have returned the same results irrespective of the question mark.
h4. Actual Result

* No results are returned from Confluence. 
* The actual JIRA Service Desk JSON request to <base_url>/rest/servicedesk/1/servicedesk/sharedportal/kb/articles?query=branch+%3F returns an empty JSON response.

h4. Workaround

Omit the "?" from the search string
fields.summary: Searching a Confluence KB with question mark from JIRA Service Desk customer portal shows no results

fields.description:
It would be great to customize the list of available buttons for anonymous users on the new Confluence layout.

Currently, anonymous users can access even the Space Tools menu. (with restrictions).

Please see the image bellow that shows what a anonymous user see while navigating on a public space.

!ABCDE.png|thumbnail!
fields.summary: Customize the display buttons on public spaces.
Make the latest Confluence documentations available for Download

h3. Summary

Shortcut "E" (Edit) is not fully functional.

h3. Affected Environments

Confluence New Look and Feel (ADG3)

h3. Steps

# Navigate to a Confluence Page where you have Edit permissions
# Press "E" to edit the page

h3. Expected Results

The Editor will open.

h3. Actual Results

Sometimes, the Editor doesn't open.
fields.summary: Shortcut "E" (Edit) is not fully functional

fields.description:
h3. Summary
The *Recently Worked on* page will display items that you only visited and not updated if your user account has already interacted with that page before (creating the page, commenting, updating it).

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Go to the *Recently worked on* page.
# Visit a page that was created by your user account for instance but do not do anything else.
# Refresh the *Recently worked on* page

h3. Expected Results
The page does not come up at the top of the list on the items that you recently worked on as no action was made.

h3. Actual Results
The page will appear in the recently worked on page even though nothing was done on it.
 
h3. Notes
The page is also displayed in the *Recently viewed* page as it should.

h3.Workaround
None.
fields.summary: Recently worked on page will put items you only visited and not actually changed

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Spaces are not showing in Space directory after being created. Content from the spaces are not searchable by the search function.

h3. Environment
confluence-prod-us-3

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a space
# Create a content on the space
# Go to the space directory or search for the content

h3. Expected Results
Space is visible in the space directory and content is searchable via search function

h3. Actual Results
Space and content is not giving any result
 
h3. Notes
Deleting the space is also not working. It looks like an index issue here. However, running content-index doesn't fix the issue.
fields.summary: Newly created spaces are not visible in the space directory

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Page Unavailable error message appears when navigating to Confluence

h3. Environment
* Confluence Cloud

h3. Cause
Atlassian operations team has detected a high load of DB connections being made by some sites that is affecting their functionality.

h3.Workaround
Restart the site.
Atlassian Support is proactively restarting affected sites while we solve the incident.
fields.summary: Confluence Cloud unavailable for some customers
[Backend] Noise Words not Parsed

fields.description:
h3. Problem
When a customer wants to replace macros and links from Server environment that don't exist in Cloud environment, they are not able to do that automatically, like replacing the ui-expand for the Cloud expand macro.

h3. Suggestion
A tools to replace the macros and links automatically

h3. Workaround
None
fields.summary: Allow to replace macros and links

fields.description:
h3. Summary

Mention in macro has different behaviour than on page
h3. Steps to Reproduce
 # Create a Confluence Page
 # Edit the Page
 # Add a Info Macro
 # @ mention someone inside the Info Macro
 # Type a few characters more and try to delete one of the characters (backspace)

h3. Expected Results

You should be able to delete each character individually
h3. Actual Results

You delete the whole mention or the whole macro
fields.summary: Press delete when typing mention in macro removes the whole mention or macro
web_development for Marketing

fields.description:
h3. Summary

When you add an Excerpt macro on a blog post with a hyperlink in the excerpt and try to display it on a Blog post macro, the excerpt is not rendered with a hyperlink and with additional text that is not part of the excerpt definition on the page.
h3. Environment

Confluence 1000.1602.1
h3. Steps to Reproduce
 # Add an *Excerpt macro* to a *blog post* with _hyperlink in the excerpt_
 # Add the *Blog Post Macro* to another page using the _"excerpt_" setting

 !Blog with excerpt.png|thumbnail!  !Published blog.png|thumbnail! 


h3. Expected Results
 * The Excerpt excerpt should be rendered correctly with hyperlink and without additional text.

h3. Actual Results
 - The Excerpt is rendered without the hyperlink with additional text that is not part of the excerpt definition on the page.

 !Blog Macro config.png|thumbnail!  !Blog macro published.png|thumbnail!
fields.summary: Setting the view mode as excerpt on Blog Posts macro does not work

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Confluence instances are going down because database connections exhausted.

Confluence then needs to be manually restarted by a tech to bring it back to working order.

h3. Expected Results
* Confluence should be accessible.

h3. Actual Results
* Confluence is not accessible.
 
h3.Workaround
Contact support to manually restart Confluence to recover access.
fields.summary: Confluence Cloud database connections exhausted

 !add.png|thumbnail!

fields.description:
h3. Problem Definition

Currently, it's not possible to set the 'Did this solve your problem?' as mandatory to exit the page or 'Back to results'.

h3. Suggested Solution

Create an option to set this question as mandatory.

h3. Why this is important

Some customers can find it useful to check the article effectiveness.
fields.summary: Option to make 'Did this solve your problem?' mandatory

fields.description:
h3. Summary

When you have an image that's aligned left, and the text that starts on the top right corner of the image (because the image is aligned left), if you insert a numbered list here, the image will hide the numbers of the list.
h3. Steps to Reproduce
 # Edit a blank page and insert an image
 # Click over the image and set it to be aligned left
 # Place the cursor at the top right of the image and insert a numbered list
 # Add as many lines to the numbered lists until the list goes below the image

h3. Expected Results

When the page is saved you'd see the numbers of the list
h3. Actual Results

The image hides de numbers of the list
h3. Notes

See attached screenshot

!Screen Shot 2017-06-28 at 13.58.46.png|thumbnail!
fields.summary: Image hides numbered list

fields.description:
h4. Summary
Some users from receive multiple emails/notifications for blog posts

h4. Environment
Unicorn 1000.1563.0

h4. How to Replicate
# Add a user to Confluence with your email
# Set it up to be notified for all blogposts
# You'll see duplicate emails eventually

h4. Expected results
Only one email
fields.summary: Duplicate notifications for blogposts

 # Create a meeting document in a space

 # Edit

 # Notice issues

fields.summary: Can't edit properties on "Create from template" macro

fields.description:
h3. Summary

Similar to [this bug in PDF|https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-5853], when tryin to export the page to Word, the current size for the tables will be the same, as displayed in the screenshot below:

!test.png|thumbnail!

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# *Edit* a page in Confluence
# Insert a *JIRA Macro*, selecting multiple issues to be displayed (as a table)
# Save the page and *Export to Word*

h3. Expected Results

The exported content should respect the width of the tables.

h3. Actual Results

The width of the tables are the same, not allowing the content of JIRA macros to be readable. 
 

h3.Workaround
Split the issues in order to avoid using tables.
fields.summary: Width Not Respected in Word Export for JIRA Issues Macro

fields.description:
h3. Summary

In Confluence, when using the Bullet points and using letters, it will export everything as numbers, not respecting the current bullet points in the page.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# *Edit* a page in Confluence
# Insert a *numbered list* with bullet points
# Press *tab* so it will change from numbers to letters
# Save the page and *Export to Word*

h3. Expected Results

The exported content should respect the bullet points according to the format used.

h3. Actual Results

All the bullet points will be displayed as numbers.
 

h3.Workaround
No workaround at the moment. Attached is a Word document used as an example.
fields.summary: Bullet Lists Issues when Exporting to Word

fields.description: Enable users to trigger and download a full Site Backup through REST API.
fields.summary: Backup Through REST API

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Site import are failing displaying the following error message on the UI:
{code}Import failed. Check your server logs for more information. Failed to import user remotely{code}


h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Perform a site import using a Confluence backup (server or cloud)

h3. Expected Results
The import completes successfully.

h3. Actual Results
The import fails displaying _Failed to import user remotely_ on the user interface.

fields.description:
h3. Summary
 !Confluence_Germany.png|thumbnail! 
---

as can be seen in the image above (with details of the instance removed) the side panel for navigation does not display when the browser is set to display using German (Germany) as the browser display mode. I was not able to replicate this by changing my language settings alone. The browser must be completely in German.
It seems that it may be related to the way that the browser reads javascript and some of the variables that are defaulted.

h3. Environment
(Optional - If Applicable)
* Cloud - Confluence
* Any Browser (in Germany variant of german language)

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Use a browser with germany as the *browser* display language. This should show all aspects of the browser itself to be in german.
# Browse to confluence.

h3. Expected Results

Confluence Sidebar will be displayed normally, but in german.

h3. Actual Results
Nothing is displayed in the sidebar and confluence is effectively unusable.

 
h3. Notes
none

h3.Workaround
Set Default Language to English for the browser, then use German as the leading language (in chrome). This should translate pages to german by default, but leave the browser in "English mode". (you will know if the https lock still says "Secure", but pages are displayed in German)
fields.summary: Browsers set to Display in German (Germany) do not show Confluence Side-Bar

h3. Summary
Pages including a large number of comments (>500) are causing Confluence to crash due to out of memory issues.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Open a page which has more than 500 comments on it.

h3. Expected Results
The page is displayed properly.

h3. Actual Results
The page times out and Confluence crashes because of an out of memory exception.
 
h3.Workaround
Current workaround includes attaching the older comments to an earlier version of the page to lighten the number of comments to display which can be done by Atlassian Cloud support.

fields.description:
h3. Summary

In a page, if we have an image align to the right, this alignment is ignored in the 'Preview mode' when editing the page. After the page is saved, the alignment is preserved, so the problem is only in preview mode.

For example, this is a page in edit mode:
!page_editmode.png|thumbnail!

Notice that there's an image with the text "TEST". This image is aligned to the right of the text.

When we click 'preview', we see this is not preserved:
!image_previewmode.png|thumbnail!

If we save it, it is preserved, though:
!image_viewmode.png|thumbnail!

Text was added to compare, but the attachment is no aligned even if it's the only element in the page.

h3. Environment
Affected version: 1000.1580.0

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a page and add text (for better comparison)
# Add any image (replicated with JPEG images, not tested with other types)
# Align it to the right of text
# Click 'Preview'

h3. Expected Results
Preview shows image aligned correctly.

h3. Actual Results
Alignment is ignored.
Not sure if related, but I could see this in the JS Console in browser:
{noformat}
VM1366 resumedraft.action?draftId=39247&draftShareId=64a2fb0f-ec07-4a23-8857-49eb6fb2ccba&:1 Uncaught (in promise) DOMException: Failed to get ServiceWorkerRegistration objects: No URL is associated with the caller's document.
{noformat}
 
h3. Notes
There were similar past bugs, but all old for Server:
https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-16693
https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFSERVER-20045

h3.Workaround
None so far.
fields.summary: Preview mode doesn't always respect image alignment

fields.description:
h3. Summary

While trying to use the editor in Chrome, the text selection will highlight not only the first line but, the second one as well, which will make the format be affected in more than one line. This behaviour works with any two consecutive lines of different styles, including quotes and preformatted text.

h3. Steps to Reproduce

\\ \\ 1. Create text of one style \(e.g. paragraph\), followed by a line of any other style \(e.g. Heading1\)\\ 2. Select the first line entirely by either:\\ 2a. Triple clicking on the line\\ 2b. Clicking and dragging the cursor until the entire line is selected.\\ 3b. Holding shift while hitting the "End" button does NOT reproduce the issue\\ 3. You will notice that there is an extra space after the end of the text but still within the selection\\ 4. Make a formatting change to the line you selected \(e.g. bold\)\\ 5. Notice that the second line has been automatically highlighted and also affected by the formatting change.\\ \\

h3. Expected Results

The highlighting feature should only affect one line.


h3. Actual Results
The highlighting feature affects the line below as well. 
h3. Notes


h3.Workaround
* Use Firefox
* Either select holding shift/command or manually select the line, without a triple click.
fields.summary: Chrome text selection selects adjacent styles

fields.description:
Here's an item for your backlog. We love Confluence Wiki pages, but one area where it could be tighter is in making it easier to collaborate on the text on a page before it goes live. Since you're product guys:

*User Story:* 

As a project manager, I want to be able to share a requirements page with key stakeholders and have them be able to suggest specific changes that I can accept or reject (similar to a Google doc in suggesting mode) so that i can quickly collaborate on the content without copying and pasting notes from various comments, bubbles, emails etc and get to a complete requirement quickly.

 

*Requirement:* 
 * A confluence page can be put into suggesting mode and shared with others. 
 * When in suggesting mode, the collaborators can physically edit the text in the page, which will be marked as a suggestion.
 * The author of the confluence page can go through each individual edit, accept, reject or comment on the change
 * If accepted, the change is updated; if rejected, that part of the page stays as it is. If commented, a comment appears and the person who made the proposal is notified
 * The date, time and user commenting is recorded
fields.summary: Suggest/Accept changes

fields.description:
h3. Problem Definition

Companies may have sensitive information in their Confluence site that watchers of a space or page will receive via email when there is a change done on the page. This is fine if the recipient server supports TLS because the on-demand cloud e-mail senders now support TLS, but this is a negotiated protocol, and if a non-TLS e-mail recipient is watching a page the confidential content will be broadcast over the internet in a non-secure fashion.

h3. Suggested Solution

The ability to change the outbound e-mail feature from "request" to "require" TLS on a space-by-space basis such that a site containing sensitive information can still be accessed by an individual with an e-mail pointing to a mail host that does not support TLS (which is a relatively small proportion of the internet population these days), but if that individual watches a page, they will not receive the notification because the e-mail sending action will "require" the receiving mail exchange to support TLS. Since TLS is not supported, the mail sending action will then fail, and not broadcast the content un-encrypted.
fields.summary: Have the option to enable 'TLS required' email notifications in Confluence

fields.description:
h3. Summary
When editing a page, if you attempt to publish the page after adding an existing images via copy/paste, an error message will be displayed. The page is actually published and the attachment is inserted.
 
h3. Environment
* Collaborative Editing is ON

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Copy an existing image from a page via the *Editor*
# Open another page and paste the image in it.
# Click on *Publish*

h3. Expected Results
The page is published properly and the image is inserted.

h3. Actual Results
A system error message page is displayed with the following message:
{noformat}
Cause
org.springframework.dao.DataIntegrityViolationException: Hibernate operation: could not execute statement; sql=n/a; SQL []; ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint "imagedetails_pkey" Detail: Key (attachmentid)=(<ID>) already exists.; nested exception is org.postgresql.util.PSQLException: ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint "imagedetails_pkey" Detail: Key (attachmentid)=(<ID>) already exists.
    at org.springframework.jdbc.support.SQLStateSQLExceptionTranslator.doTranslate(SQLStateSQLExceptionTranslator.java:102)
caused by: org.postgresql.util.PSQLException: ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint "imagedetails_pkey" Detail: Key (attachmentid)=(<ID>) already exists.
    at org.postgresql.core.v3.QueryExecutorImpl.receiveErrorResponse(QueryExecutorImpl.java:2157)
{noformat}
 
h3.Workaround
The page and changes are published when you go back to the page.
To not get this error message, we would suggest adding the images via the *Files and Images* macro and search for the image you would like to re-use.
fields.summary: Copy-pasting existing images in Confluence will throw a system error message

fields.description:
h3. Summary
When editing a page in Confluence on the iOS app on an iPad using the Smart Keyboard, the bottom half of the editing area is covered by a white overlay. Presumably this is due to the fact that the application is assuming this area to be covered by the on-screen keyboard.

h3. Environment
*  Confluence Cloud 1000.1531.2
*  Confluence Mobile app for iOS version 2.0.12

h3. Steps to Reproduce
- Open a Confluence page on the mobile app that has enough content where you would need to scroll.
- Click edit on the page.

h3. Expected Results
Page should load with the full set of content so we can edit without being blocked by the overlay.

h3. Actual Results
!Screen Shot 2017-06-15 at 1.42.03 PM.jpg|thumbnail! 

h3.Workaround
No current workaround.
fields.summary: When editing a page in mobile app on iPad with Smart Keyboard, editing area is reduced

fields.description:
h3. Summary
It is unable to export site back even excluding attachments.

h3. Environment
* This occurs especially with large instance exceeding limit of [Atlassian Cloud storage policy|https://confluence.atlassian.com/cloud/atlassian-cloud-storage-policy-873871366.html] (e.g. 100GB+).


h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Login to Confluence Cloud as admin
# Go to _Backup manager_
# Deselect _Backup attachments_ checkbox
# Click _Create backup_

h3. Expected Results
Backup gets successfully created.

h3. Actual Results
# Backup manager shows _"Writing export"_ message for hours 
# Eventually Confluence Cloud gets entirely unavailable with _"Page unavailable"_ error page

h3. Notes
* Atlassian confirms there are several instances potentially affected by this issue

h3.Workaround
* Contact Atlassian Support from https://support.atlassian.com/contact/.
fields.summary: Site backup unavailability due to OOME at large instance

h3. Actual Results
Configuration applied

!screenshot-3.png|thumbnail!

fields.description:
The copy and paste table row / column functions in the editor toolbar stop working when local storage is full. A QUOTA_EXCEEDED_ERR can also be seen in the JS console.

Ideally, these should fall back to storing the content in memory when local storage is full. We should also update the call from {{AJS.storageManager.setItem}} to {{AJS.storageManager.setItemQuietly}}.

h4. How to tell if you are impacted by this bug

1. Open your JavaScript console in the editor (View > Developer > JavaScript console in Chrome)
2. Cut a table row or column and look for a {{QUOTA_EXCEEDED_ERR}} message in the console

h4. Workaround (instructions for Chrome)

1. View > Developer > Developer Tools > Application > Storage
2. Expand Local Storage section and select the URL of the Confluence instance where you encountered this issue
3. Clear some local storage entries, you may want to start with those with the {{atlassian.editor}} prefix
fields.summary: Can not copy / paste a table row or column if local storage is full

fields.description:
h3. Summary

When reloading a Confluence page that has a file or image thumbnail, broken images are rendered.

 !broken images.png|thumbnail! 

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a page and add a file or image on the page.
# Load the page and notice that the file or image thumbnail gets displayed properly on the page.
# Wait for 1 to 2 hours and reload the same page.

h3. Expected Results

The file or image thumbnail should load properly on the reloaded page.

h3. Actual Results

Broken images are rendered on the page.

h3.Workaround

Clear the browser cache and reload the page.

{quote}
Google Chrome : [Clear cache and cookies|https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/32050?hl=en]
Firefox : [How to clear the Firefox cache|https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/how-clear-firefox-cache#w_clear-the-cache]
Edge : *More options > Settings > Clear browsing data : Choose what to clear > Cached data and file > Clear*
Internet Explorer : *Tools > Safety > Delete Browsing History > Temporary Internet files and website files > Delete*
Safari : *Develop > Empty Caches*
{quote}
fields.summary: Broken images rendered on a reloaded Confluence page

fields.description:
h3. Summary

The images on the page sometimes show correctly, but sometimes it shows broken.
h3. Environment
 * Cloud Version 1000.1475.2

h3. Steps to Reproduce
 # View a page with images
 # View the page again after1 - 2 hours or refresh the page few time until the image shows broken

h3. Expected Results

The thumbnail should show as configured
h3. Actual Results

The images are not showing broken image.
 !screenshot1.jpg|thumbnail!

From the Development Panel, it shows Error 403
{code:java}
{"error":{"code":"JwtAuthoriser:TokenExpiredError","title":"Token verification failed: jwt expired","href":"https://media-api.atlassian.io#UnauthorizedError"}}
{code}
h3. Notes
 * The image is working when clicking on the thumbnail for the preview mode.

h3. Workaround
 * Clear browser cache, then refresh the page. This will work immediately, but the images will be broken again after the token is expired.
{quote}Google Chrome : [Clear cache and cookies|https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/32050?hl=en]
 Firefox : [How to clear the Firefox cache|https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/how-clear-firefox-cache#w_clear-the-cache]
 Edge : *More options > Settings > Clear browsing data : Choose what to clear > Cached data and file > Clear*
 Internet Explorer : *Tools > Safety > Delete Browsing History > Temporary Internet files and website files > Delete*
 Safari : *Develop > Empty Caches*
{quote}
fields.summary: Image Thumbnails Constantly Broken
Pages timeout when attempting to display them if they have attachments sometimes causing Confluence outages

fields.description:
h3. Summary
PDF space export are getting stuck at 50% and never completes.

h3. Environment
* Confluence Cloud 1000.1475.1

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Perform a space PDF export on a large file where the operation takes longer than 5 minutes to complete

h3. Expected Results
The space is exported properly and a download link is provided at the end to retrieve it.

h3. Actual Results
The export operation get stuck at 50% and displays the following on the user interface:
{noformat}
Begin conversion of intermediate HTML to PDF
{noformat}

This is displayed in Confluence logs:

{code}2017-06-08 15:05:55.119537500 2017-06-08 15:05:55,115 WARN [http-bio-1992-exec-55] [confluence.impl.progress.TaskDao] setInactiveNonTerminalTaskDead Inactive task 87496431 set to DEAD; lock if any will now be released {{action,runningtaskxml}{referer,https://URL/wiki/spaces/flyingpdf/doflyingpdf.action?key=SPACEID}{traceId,ce3cf8ddc034fae3}{url,/wiki/runningtaskxml.action}{userName,557057:3e018812-c5ae-414c-ae6c-cf52013e9e69}}{code} 

h3.Workaround
Use the *Custom Export* option to separate the export in smaller chunks and re-assemble them once all are exported.
fields.summary: PDF/Html space export are stuck at 50%

fields.description:
I need to change the full name of users.

When creating their login, I entered (or was it auto filled in?) their email address.
It was never mentioned you could not change the full name at a later stage, or how/where this full name would show.
fields.summary: cannot change user's FULL name

fields.description:
h3. Summary
When trying to use an attachment coming from another page on the Excel macro, no erros will be shown on the preview screen. But as soon as the page is published, an error will be shown instead of the macro.

h3. Environment
Cloud - Confluence 
Tested in Confluence 1000.1475.1

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Attach a file in a Confluence page
# Go to another page and edit the page 
# Include an Excel Macro 
# Inform the page that contains the attachment on the *Page name* field
# Select the attachment on the *File name* field
# Publish the page 

OBS: No difference has been noticed when using .xls or .xlsx files, both don't work.

h3. Expected Results
The selected file should be shown without issues.
h3. Actual Results
An error message replaces the macro.
Example of error message :

{quote} Error rendering macro 'viewxls' : Failed to find attachment with Name xxxxxx.xlsx{quote}

h3.Workaround
Only possible workaround for now is to attach the same file into all pages (not ideal if the files are too big, could lead to performance issues)
fields.summary: Office Macro isn't accepting attachments stored in other pages

fields.description:
h3. Summary

Automatic Color Scheme Applied from Logo Not Consistent Between JIRA and Confluence

h3. Environment

* JIRA v1000.1034.2
* Confluence 1000.1475.1

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# In JIRA go to 'Look and Feel' settings and upload the logo attached to this report (57x57.png)
# Color scheme should automatically be updated. If not, click where it states: "To apply a color scheme that matches your logo, click here."
# In Confluence go to 'Site Logo and Favicon' settings and upload same logo (57x57.png)
# Color scheme should be updated to match logo

h3. Expected Results

Same color scheme is applied to both JIRA and Confluence

h3. Actual Results

Color scheme between JIRA and Confluence are different (Top Bar is light green in Confluence instead of white like in JIRA) 

h3.Workaround

* Manually edit Color Scheme in Confluence / JIRA to match each other
fields.summary: Automatic Color Scheme Applied from Logo Not Consistent Between JIRA and Confluence

fields.description:
h3. Summary
Questions for Confluence is not working. It keeps loading forever.

h3. Environment
Cloud - Confluence v1000.1475.1

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# click on spaces, select one and open it
# Click on questions on the left menu panel
# It should open a page with the following url: instancename.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/<spacekey>/questions/all

h3. Expected Results
It should list the questions for that space.

h3. Actual Results
The page keeps spinning and does not load.

h3. Notes
It seems to affect only the page questions within the space. 

h3.Workaround
Questions works if it's opened from the home page of Confluence. instancename.atlassian.net/wiki/questions
fields.summary: Questions do not load on Spaces

fields.description:
h3. Summary
The [Change-historty|https://support.atlassian.com/confluence-cloud/docs/insert-the-change-history-macro/] macro is a great feature that pulls all the latest versions that our page has. 
Though, it would be better to have some options to customize it.

h3. Suggestion
Add some options to customize it to show only the last X versions and which columns to be displayed - for example, sometimes we want only to show the current version of the page.
fields.summary: Make "Change-history" macro more flexible

fields.summary: Site import are failing with the error message "com.atlassian.confluence.user.UserManagementOperationFailedException: com.atlassian.idp.client.exceptions.BadRequestException: No response body"

fields.description:
h3. Summary
The *Meeting Notes* template available in Confluence has a date picker lozenge that behaves differently than the date picker available for end-users. When creating a page using the template, the picker pulls the current date. But when creating a template using the same date picker and using it to create a new page, the default date that will be shown will be the date when the template was created. 

h3. Environment
Cloud - Confluence 1000.1465.0

h3. Steps to Reproduce

# Create a template using the date picker lozenge 
# Try to use the template after a few days
# The date picker will show by default the same date when the template was created

h3. Expected Results
The date picker should show the current date.

h3. Actual Results
The date picker will show by default the same date when the template was created

h3.Workaround
Modify the original template (taking extra care to not remove the picker) while doing so.
fields.summary: The date picker lozenge available on Meeting Notes template has a different behavior when creating new templates
